definitions.definition: A body suspended from a fixed support so that it swings freely back and forth under the influence of gravity , commonly used to regulate various devices such as clocks .

subdefinitions.definition: The tendency of a situation to oscillate (between two extremes).

definitions.definition: A lamp, etc. suspended from a ceiling.
A watch's guard-ring by which it is attached to a chain.

main_definition: ( clocks , mechanics ) A body suspended from a fixed support so that it swings freely back and forth under the influence of gravity , commonly used to regulate various devices such as clocks .
secondary_definitions: A lamp, etc. suspended from a ceiling.
A watch's guard-ring by which it is attached to a chain.
